column2: 14]]''' - [[E.V. Gordon]], a later colleague of Tolkien, is born.

15]]''' - [[Arthur Tolkien]] dies in [[Bloemfontein]], as a result of a severe hemorrhage suffered the previous day. He had been sick for many months with rheumatic fever, and never made the trip to [[Birmingham]] to see his family.
Mabel Tolkien]] and her family move from Birmingham to the hamlet of [[Sarehole]].
1]]''' - [[John Benjamin Tolkien]], grandfather of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], dies.
3]]''' - [[William Morris]], artist and author who influenced [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], dies.
